verses.verse: <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H8085>listen,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and to the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3925>teach<s%> you, for to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.

You shall not <S%H3254>add<s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H1639>diminish<s%> ought from it, that you may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you.

Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> because of <S%H1187>Baalpeor:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H1187>Baalpeor,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.
But you that did <S%H1695>join<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H2416>alive<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one of you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3925>taught<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> even as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me, that you should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

<S%H8104>Keep<s%> therefore and <S%H6213>do<s%> them; for <S%H1931>this<s%> is your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and your <S%H998>understanding<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>nations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Surely <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> and <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

For <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is there so <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H430>God<s%> so <S%H7126>near<s%> to them, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> is in <S%H3605>all<s%> things that we <S%H7121>call<s%> on him for?

And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> is there so <S%H1419>great,<s%> that has <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> so <S%H6662>righteous<s%> as <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day?<s%>

<S%H7535>Only<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3966>diligently,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and <S%H6435>lest<s%> they <S%H5493>depart<s%> from your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life:<s%> but <S%H3045>teach<s%> them your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%>

Specially the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6950>Gather<s%> me the <S%H5971>people<s%> together, and I will make them <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%> that they may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> that they shall <S%H2416>live<s%> on the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and that they may <S%H3925>teach<s%> their <S%H1121>children.<s%>

And you <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> to the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> with <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H6051>clouds,<s%> and thick <S%H6205>darkness.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire:<s%> you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words,<s%> but <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8544>similitude;<s%> <S%H2108>only<s%> you <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

And he <S%H5046>declared<s%> to you his <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>perform,<s%> even <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments;<s%> and he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> them on <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me at that <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> you <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> that you might <S%H6213>do<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

Take you therefore <S%H3966>good<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H5315>yourselves;<s%> for you <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> manner of <S%H8544>similitude<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire:<s%>

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> you <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> yourselves, and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, the <S%H8544>similitude<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5566>figure,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5347>female,<s%>

The <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> that is <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3671>winged<s%> <S%H6833>fowl<s%> that <S%H5774>flies<s%> in the <S%H8064>air,<s%>

The <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H127>ground,<s%> the <S%H8403>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1710>fish<s%> that is in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H8478>beneath<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

And <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H5375>lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and when you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> should be <S%H5080>driven<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H2505>divided<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>nations<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3947>taken<s%> you, and <S%H3318>brought<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> even out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to be to him a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as you are <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

Furthermore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1697>sakes,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> that I should not <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and that I should not <S%H935>go<s%> in to that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%>

But I must <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> I must not <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> but you shall <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourselves, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he made with you, and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, or the <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing, <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>forbidden<s%> you.
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> even a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> you shall <S%H3205>beget<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> and children's <S%H1121>children,<s%> and you shall have <S%H3462>remained<s%> long in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> yourselves, and <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, or the <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> thing, and shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger:<s%>

I <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H5749>witness<s%> against you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that you shall <S%H4116>soon<s%> utterly <S%H6>perish<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whereunto<s%> you <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it; you shall not <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> on it, but shall utterly be <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H6327>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H5971>nations,<s%> and you shall be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H4962>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> you.

And <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7306>smell.<s%>

But if from <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> you shall <S%H4672>find<s%> him, <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H1875>seek<s%> him with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

When you are in <S%H6862>tribulation,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> are <S%H4672>come<s%> on you, even in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> if you <S%H7725>turn<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and shall be <S%H8085>obedient<s%> to his <S%H6963>voice;<s%>

(For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H7349>merciful<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%>) he will not <S%H7503>forsake<s%> you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them.

For <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that are <S%H7223>past,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and ask from the one <S%H7097>side<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> to the other, whether there has <S%H1961>been<s%> any such thing as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is, <S%H176>or<s%> has been <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> it?

Did ever <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> as you have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and <S%H2421>live?<s%>

<S%H176>Or<s%> has <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5254>assayed<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> him a <S%H1471>nation<s%> from the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of another <S%H1471>nation,<s%> by <S%H4531>temptations,<s%> by <S%H226>signs,<s%> and by <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and by <S%H4421>war,<s%> and by a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and by a <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terrors,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>
To you it was <S%H7200>showed,<s%> that you might <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> he is <S%H430>God;<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> him.

Out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> he made you to <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> that he might <S%H3256>instruct<s%> you: and on <S%H776>earth<s%> he <S%H7200>showed<s%> you his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H784>fire;<s%> and you <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> out of the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H157>loved<s%> your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> therefore he <S%H977>chose<s%> their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, and <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out in his <S%H6440>sight<s%> with his <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

To <S%H3423>drive<s%> out <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than you are, to <S%H935>bring<s%> you in, to <S%H5414>give<s%> you their <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H3045>Know<s%> therefore this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H7725>consider<s%> it in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> he is <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> and on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8478>beneath:<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else.<s%>

You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> therefore his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> that it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with you, and with your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, and that you may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> on the <S%H127>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, for <S%H3605>ever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H914>severed<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H4217>rise;<s%>

That the <S%H7523>slayer<s%> might <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> should <S%H7523>kill<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1097>unawares,<s%> <S%H1847><s%> and <S%H8130>hated<s%> him not in <S%H8543>times<s%> <S%H8032>past;<s%> and that <S%H5127>fleeing<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> he might <S%H2425>live:<s%>
